title: bArO bArayya
sahitya:
bArO bArayya namma bAla gOpAlakrSNa


anupallavi

  jAratanava biDO jAnakIramaNane nAriyalellaru 
navanIta cOranendu dUru hELali sAra Odida shrI nIlagiri vAsa


caraNam 1    aniruddha janArdana Ananda nilaya hari muni mauni sahavAsa mukunda varada ghana nIlamEgha 
shyAma kAmitArta kamalanAbha sanakAdi vandya sAgara shayana sArasa nEtra shAshvata rUpa
   caraNam 2    muddu koTTEnu bArO muni sadEtako tande buddhi kELayya namma bhadrAdri ramaNa 
haddanu Eri koNDu amarara kUDi Adi buddha nAthane beNNe kadda kaLLane kastUri rangane
    caraNam 3    narahari mAdhava viSNu nandanandane sharadhi bandhane ninage sharaNuva hondide 
sEride mele ninna berede appayya ranga sharaNa mandAra shESagirIsha varada purandara viTTala
